line_1: Where Neptune's waves affrap the sturdy pier;
line_2: In all adventures a most faithful seer;

line_1: Where Neptune's waves affrap the sturdy pier;
line_2: And thro' that city he doth quickly steer,

line_1: Where Neptune's waves affrap the sturdy pier;
line_2: The kings of Kent did erst inhabit here,
See Pension's harbour large and clear,
